products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Vanilla - Roller Blind
products.description: Trinity blackout vanilla allows you to add that subtle and refined touch of style to your home that it can be so hard to pin down. It's a gentle blend of cream and beige that sits elegantly in the background, giving your other colours the freedom to come to the fore and catch the eye. If you want to add something elegant and understated to the master bedroom then try combining vanilla with a matching rug atop a laminate floor.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Dove - Roller Blind
products.description: When you think of a fabric that allows you to introduce some understated contemporary chic with a luxury vibe, it would be hard to think of anything other than trinity blackout dove. It's the beautiful finishing touch that no home should be without, so why hold back any longer?As you sit down and run your mind through the various different options, you need to think about how to match to your furniture.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Ash - Roller Blind
products.description: As you take in the subtle aesthetic of trinity blackout ash it would be all too easy to think that it's another stone grey fabric. Look closer however and you'll soon see that this couldn't be wider of the mark. It's a gentle grey that has a slightly earthy quality from which it takes it name. The beauty of this type of unifying colour is that it allows you to introduce all sorts of other shades into your chosen space.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Dusk - Roller Blind
products.description: As you lie back and put your feet up for the evening you want to be able to feel at ease. The beauty of their new trinity blackout dusk fabric is that it catches the magic of this most restful of times of day, and leaves you feeling at peace. Combining dusk with a gentle washed out green is a great way to introduce natural colour to the living room without overdoing things. It's all about creating a relaxing space that you never want to leave, so take your time with it and the answers will appear before your eyes.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), White - Roller Blind
products.description: Trinity blackout white is a roller blind that allows you to drift off into a deep sleep the moment your head hits the pillow. With a light and breezy design that's easy on the eye, and crafted with care from their signature blackout fabric, it's everything you need to create your own little oasis of calm. Matching trinity white with neutral walls and light stained floors is an inspired choice if you want to create a bedroom that you can rest and relax in before bedtime.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Baby Blue - Roller Blind
products.description: Our new baby blue fabric is already proving to be one of the most popular additions to the trinity blackout collection, and with good reason. It offers a subtle texture that sits gently in the background, adding something that will be appreciated no matter which room you choose to use it in. The wonderful thing about baby blue is that you can use it to set the tone for any number of different creative avenues.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Soft Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: For those of you how love the simple elegance of everyday colours combined with flawless craftsmanship, their new trinity (blackout) soft grey fabric has everything you've been looking for. It's all about taking the time to appreciate what it adds to your space, and then pairing it with the complimentary touches that will make all the difference. As you take in the serenity and tranquility of trinity (blackout) soft grey you can sense the ideas coming together.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Mauve - Roller Blind
products.description: We love the modern aesthetic of trinity blackout mauve because it allows you to take your time, sit back, and take it all in. This is a deep and moody colour that entices you in to take a closer look, and then puts your mind at ease. If you want to be able to add some style to the upstairs landing then why not match your runner to mauve? You could even stagger your photos down the stairs so that you can create a transitory feature wall that follows you as you transition between floors.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Pewter - Roller Blind
products.description: Pewter is a blackout fabric with a difference, and one that we guarantee you'll fall in love with the moment you see it in your home. It's all about introducing natural tones that introduce an understated sense of style. Simple, authentic, and homely; these are the 3 words which instantly come to mind. Sit back and take in the different creative avenues that you have at your disposal and you'll be able to take your decor in an exciting new direction.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Lipstick - Roller Blind
products.description: Decorating is as much about setting existing spaces free of their longstanding constraints as it is about breathing new life into your home. Trinity blackout lipstick adds style and flair to any room in the house, and does it all by staying true to the contemporary colours that you're searching for. When you want to be able to add a real talking point to the dining room there's no better way to do it than by taking lipstick as the starting point.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Stone - Roller Blind
products.description: Stone from their ever-popular trinity blackout range allows you to add a calming combination of country chic and contemporary minimalism to your chosen space. It's all about enjoying the relaxing nature of the fabric, and using it to create a space you never want to leave. Sitting back and thinking about which direction you want to take your decor in is the name of the game here. Do you go contemporary? Or do you go down the country route? The choice is yours, and the options are incredible.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Poppy Red - Roller Blind
products.description: Trinity (blackout) poppy red is a colour that evokes memories, passion, and plenty of amazing new ideas. It's all about taking the time to fall in love with your decor, and not being afraid to try something new. The gentle weave sits in the background, but it's the homely red that really catches the eye. Matching to trinity (blackout) poppy red is all about taking the time to get the balance right.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Canary - Roller Blind
products.description: The thing that first caught their eye when taking in canary from their trinity blackout range is the way in which it illuminates the room. As the yellow shines bright you get a real sense of proportion and scale for the very first time, no matter how compact your chosen space. It's all about introducing balancing colours like sky blue and grassy greens. That way you can capture the essence of natural colour without running the risk of overdoing things.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Sea Green - Roller Blind
products.description: Take one look at trinity blackout in sea green, and what do you see? To us it's an electric infusion that allows you to take your mind back to those days spent by the coast. The sun, the sea, and the clear blue sky all come to mind, and yet sea green still offers something more. Matching to sea green is something you may feel is a subtle art given how striking it is, but that just means you might be overthinking things.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Denim - Roller Blind
products.description: Trinity blackout in denim is so much more than a fabric that allows you to get the perfect restful sleep mind and body need. It's a contemporary shade whose texture really brings the colour to life, and allows you to do something a little bit special. We love the idea of hanging denim in the kitchen so that you can turn on the style when it's time to cook up a feast. If you have the option to match it to the tiling then even better, but don't feel like you have to constrain yourself when the time comes to make a change.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Fuschia - Roller Blind
products.description: We love trinity blackout in fuschia for a couple of reasons. Firstly, it allows you to drift off into the deep sleep that will leave you feeling rested and relaxed the moment you wake. And secondly, it allows the electricity to flow into the room and enliven any space the instant you lower your blinds. If you love the idea of creating the perfect chill out space, why not add fuschia to the lounge? Add a glass coffee table, matching entertainment unit, and think about other modern touches you can introduce along the way.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Shadow - Roller Blind
products.description: When you think of a shadow you think of the absence of light, but what if you could turn conventional wisdom on its head? Trinity blackout shadow welcomes you into a world in which nothing is quite what it seems, and your dark fabric is actually a natural charcoal that brings any space to life. We love the idea of pairing shadow with light lively natural shades to provide some natural balance and contrast.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Steel - Roller Blind
products.description: Trinity blackout steel is the subtle blend of greys and metallic blues that is set to be one of the breakout colours of the season. It's one of those intersectional colours that allows you to add a unifying presence to any room in the house, and to do it all in a refined and elegant way. If you want to be able to connect the various features in the bedroom then steel could be the hub you've been waiting for.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Flint - Roller Blind
products.description: When it comes to natural colours that allow you to introduce a unifying sense of calm to your chosen space, trinity blackout flint may just be the answer you seek. It's colour is true to its name, and allows you to take your decor in a dozen difference directions. If you want to be able to introduce natural textures and still keep the contemporary look you love, think about real wooden furniture and leather seating to match your new rollers.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Light Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: The one thing that we love about trinity blackout light grey is that it allows you to lose yourself in the moment the instant you set eyes on it. Take one look at the finely woven fabric and you get a sense of the regal calm you could add to your decor. We love the idea of hanging light grey against some pale magnolia walls, and above a light pine effect laminate floor. That way you can celebrate the way in which these neutral shades compliment one another as you sit back and take it all in.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Smoke - Roller Blind
products.description: Trinity (blackout) black smoke is a colour that you perhaps don't expect to find all that often, but it's certainly a welcome surprise when you find it staring right back at you. The beauty of the washed blue is that it clearly sits atop a foundation of light grey that gives it a natural stone-like quality. This is a fabric that has 'versatility' as its middle name, so why not embrace the new creative avenues that it opens? It's all about allowing your individuality to run free so that you can really put your own stamp on things.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Platinum - Roller Blind
products.description: True to its name, trinity blackout platinum combines the perfect night's sleep with the touch of luxury that no home should be without. The striking colour catches the eye from all angles, and is the perfect addition to the contemporary home in search of a subtle tweak. If you want to be able to create the relaxing little haven that will allow you to drift off to sleep the moment your head hits the pillow, platinum makes it happen.

products.title: Roma, Scarlet - Roller Blind
products.description: In cosy, eye-catching red, the roma scarlet is no wallflower. As rich in quality as it is in colour, this blind is a must-have for red enthusiasts looking for a durable window covering for their home. Use the scarlet to offset rich cream walls for a cosy look in the living room. Add natural beiges, fellow reds, and even more cream to keep the look simple yet effective, and be sure to add plenty of wood for a wonderfully homely feel.

products.title: Roma, Thunderbird - Roller Blind
products.description: Roma thunderbird is not a shade to be missed - as in, it simply can't be. Bold and memorable, this blind is almost opaque, yet doesn't block out the light entirely, making for a great compromise. Don't be shy; use the thunderbird as a central feature in your white or cream kitchen, or go bold in the bathroom by opting for a non-traditional colour scheme of red and white. Or you might find that this daring red provides you with all the motivation you need in your home office.

products.title: Roma, Snuff - Roller Blind
products.description: Add some dusky mystery to your home with the roma in snuff. This pretty, distinctive hushed purple shade is a colour all its own, and can create either a subtle or striking look depending on what you do with it. One thing's for sure, its pliable yet durable material means it's easy to use and will stand the test of time. Counter rich, striking purples for a lavish, deluxe vibe in a bedroom, or use against whites and creams in the bathroom or kitchen.

products.title: Roma, Hot Pink - Roller Blind
products.description: Roma hot pink is a silky blend of pink and purple that will add some heat and spice to your decor in seconds. If you love to be able to walk into a room and feel the love, this is the fabric you've been waiting a lifetime for. We love the idea of pairing hot pink with smouldering reds and sun-kissed oranges to create a light and vibrant atmosphere you'll never want to leave. Get the balance right and you'll know it when you see it.

products.title: Roma, Rose Tint - Roller Blind
products.description: The roma rose tint is as dusky as it is pretty, and its smoky overtones give this pink blind an extra level of style. Roma's simple fabric hangs flawlessly and without fuss, allowing all your focus to be on the attractive pink tone. Team the rose tint with stark whites to add a contemporary feel to this vintage tone. Bright white walls will make the colour pop, whilst this lovely colour scheme will feel relaxed and cheery in a bedroom, living room, or even kitchen.

products.title: Roma, Polar - Roller Blind
products.description: The roma's polar is an icy mint green, verging on turquoise, and is the ideal hue for giving a room a unique, pretty feel. It's crisp, modern tone means that light can still penetrate through, even when closed, so you'll never feel shut in. Beautiful when set against pure white walls, the polar is a great choice for a fresh, airy living room, or a bright utility. The shade will also work well amongst browns and beiges, so don't be afraid to add a splash of colour to your neutral living room or office.

products.title: Roma, Lime - Roller Blind
products.description: There's no getting away from it, the roma's lime is a bright, fun, in-your-face kind of colour. And when trying to make a statement, that's no bad thing. If you're feeling adventurous, or just want to give your dcor a little jumpstart, this could be the window covering for you. As long as you're looking for colour and vibrancy, we can't think of a room this blind won't work in. We particularly love it in a kitchen or dining room.

products.title: Roma, Chicory - Roller Blind
products.description: The deep midnight blue of the roma chicory is tranquil yet eye-catching, whilst the canvas it colours is strong and long-lasting, making this the perfect choice for a busy family home and all the hustle and bustle that comes with it. Include the chicory in a teenager's bedroom for a moody atmosphere and team up with pale greys and shimmering silvers to add character and contrast. For younger teens, consider adding a space theme, which will work wonderfully with this deep blue tone.

products.title: Roma, Firefly - Roller Blind
products.description: Take one look at the warm and inviting tone of roma firefly and you instantly feel at home. The luscious powdered orange helps create that warm and cosy feeling all year round, and it does it with the touch of contemporary style you've been waiting for. If you really want to fall in love with your interiors all over again, why not take your decor in a vivid new direction? Some throws over the back of the couches, bold patterns as the backdrop to your feature wall, and of course some bare wood floors.

products.title: Roma, Fuscous Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: The roma's fuscous grey is a neutral, lead shade that's ideal for the modern styled home. The sturdy fabric is great for light control, whilst not entirely blacking out a room. All of their roller-blinds use quality aluminium tubes so they're easy to move - totally fuss-free. Pair with whites and other neutrals for a monochrome look, or with bright yellows or limes for a funky, current style. The perfect blind for a fresh, contemporary office, striking when coupled with light woods, white furniture, and the latest tech.

products.title: Roma, Grey Nickel - Roller Blind
products.description: Halfway between a grey and a beige, the roma roller-blind in grey nickel is the perfect neutral for all kinds of dcor styles. Its hardy fabric offers privacy while still allowing some light to penetrate through. Use amongst pretty florals for some country chic or with plain, but bold colours like royal blues and deep reds for a contemporary style. Grey nickel makes the perfect window accent in a country kitchen or contemporary hallway - or indeed, any style room.

products.title: Roma, Urban - Roller Blind
products.description: In the softest of pale greys, the roma in urban offers an understated neutral to your home. The simple tone is subtle, and the papery feel belies the true strength of the fabric, which will easily last the wear and tear of family life. Use the urban to offset stronger tones, be they deep charcoal greys or bottomless jet blacks for a monochromatic look, or pretty plum and pinky tones for something more colourful.

products.title: Roma, Rodeo Dust - Roller Blind
products.description: Roma's beautiful in beige rodeo dust is the ideal option when looking for a subtle neutral for your home. Firm and durable, this blind is still lightweight enough to allow some light to penetrate and doesn't darken a room too much when closed. This pale shade of brown will work with many different colours, most namely other, darker browns, but also deep reds, dusky purples, and deep navy blues. This is a lovely blind for a dark, moody dining room, a neutral and cream living room, or a calming home office.

products.title: Roma, Peony - Roller Blind
products.description: The beauty of roma peony is that it takes the traditional deep purples that you associate with days gone by, and brings it right up to date with a subtle infusion you can't quite put your finger on. It's all about taking things in an exciting new direction, so why not just embrace it and see where it leads?If you want to create a space you will never want to leave, there's no better way to do it than by mixing in black finishing touches.

products.title: Roma, Belize - Roller Blind
products.description: For those of you who love contemporary colours that put the electricity in the air we give you roma belize. It's a chic and stylish colour that will welcome you through the door, pour you a glass, and invite you to put your feet up. It's exactly the homely touch that you've been waiting for. If you want to be able to reimagine your decor you need to give your ideas the freedom to ebb and flow. Take the time to think about how you want to do things differently, and before you know it you'll be relaxing in a room you've instantly fallen in love with.

products.title: Roma, Sage - Roller Blind
products.description: In a pretty shade of sage green, to match its name, the roma sage is refreshingly sweet. No bright limes or deep forests here, just simple, unassuming colour, perfect for brightening up any room. Fill a kitchen with a natural yet colourful glow by including the sage in your decor. Add matching green tones as well as pretty, pale creams, opting for some natural, light woods too. Pastels make for a lovely, relaxing look, which is exactly what you need in your kitchen.

products.title: Roma, Persian Pastel - Roller Blind
products.description: In perfect purple, the roma in persian pastel is a simple yet unusual blind. A distinctive choice of colour, purple is usually seen in deep, eye-catching shades, yet this has a more understated look to it that might appeal even to those who aren't usually purple enthusiasts. Team the persian pastel with pale dove greys and keep the look simple yet attractive. Include stripes or checks for a contemporary look, or pretty florals for a more elegant and traditional style.

products.title: Roma, Aqua Haze - Roller Blind
products.description: The sweet duck egg of roma's aqua haze makes for a lovely accent to any window. The colour really comes into its own when set against the outside sunlight, and it provides privacy without blocking the light out altogether. For some country chic, pair with pretty floral curtains in your dining room or place against white walls and pine units in a kitchen to truly brighten things up. The pale colour also makes this the ideal blind for small utility rooms or bathrooms that don't get a lot of natural light.

products.title: Roma, Sunrise - Roller Blind
products.description: Offsetting a range of colours and hues is what roma sunrise does best. It adds a warm and soothing glow to any setting, and does it all in a way that ensures you never run the risk of overpowering the existing decor. Just the ticket when you want to breathe new life into things. Taking a step back and thinking about what you want to bring to the fore is the best way to introduce sunrise to your bedroom.

products.title: Roma, Monza - Roller Blind
products.description: The courageous scarlet of the roma monza is both cheery and daring, and not for the shy and retiring room. The high quality, durable fabric leaves nothing to be desired, as it makes for the perfect, hassle-free, lasting blind. Be brave and use the monza as a focal point in a sleek, grey and black colour schemed living room or bedroom. You might also find that it makes the perfect finishing touch for a white utility room or neutral hallway.

products.title: Roma, Primrose - Roller Blind
products.description: True to its name, the roma primrose is a soft and pretty yellow, steering away from less delicate lemons and mustards into a more subtle and delicate piece. The sweetness of the shade hides a strong and sturdy fabric, useful for the hustle and bustle of busy family life. Go for an unusual but attractive colour scheme in the bathroom by opting for soft yellows and off-whites rather than the usual blues and teals.

products.title: Roma, Bahia - Roller Blind
products.description: Please the nature lovers in your home with the roma in bahia. This rich, natural green will add a contemporary yet eco look to any room, offering privacy and filtering out unwanted sunlight at the same time. Complement the bahia with darker shades of green, with some balancing browns and neutrals thrown in there for good measure. This blind will make a striking addition to a dark, moody dining room, or a bright, white office space.

products.title: Roma, Subtle - Roller Blind
products.description: In the loveliest of summer pinks, the roma subtle is as understated as its name suggests. The vintage pink tone is pretty and versatile, whilst the roma fabric is high quality and will certainly stand the test of time. Pair the subtle with soft dove greys for a somewhat retro look in the master bedroom, adding shabby chic accessories to keep the scheme bang on trend. Add luxe with faux furs and silver accessories, keeping comfort in mind as your top priority.

products.title: Roma, Tuscan Rose - Roller Blind
products.description: The roma tuscan rose couldn't be better named. Its dusky pink tone is as warm as it is pretty, and the vintage look will appeal to many different tastes. The papery feel of the roma fabric is pleasant to touch, though the material itself is strong and durable. Give a delicate look to a traditional dining room, pairing the tuscan rose with dark, polished woods and palest pink walls. This look would also work well in a guest or master bedroom, or even in the living room for a relaxing atmosphere.

products.title: Roma, Heatwave - Roller Blind
products.description: Roma heatwave allows you to lose yourself in a world of dreamy pinks that will have you thinking about all the exciting avenues you could take you decor in. The lightweight fabric moves gently in the breeze, whilst the electricity of the colour gives you plenty of food for thought. Introduce heatwave to the kitchen when you're cooking up a feast with this one of a kind shade and you'll find the spark of inspiration you've been looking for.

products.title: Roma, Bronco - Roller Blind
products.description: Neutrals don't have to be boring, you know. In fact, the roma bronco is far from it. This delicate brown works well as a soft accent to other, deeper colours, or as a standalone shade in its own right. Set the bronco against cream walls and light-coloured furniture for a light and airy bedroom, or use to complement dark-coloured woods and deep browns in a dusky, moody dining room. It will also work well as a window covering for a hallway or utility room, where no real colour scheme is in play.

products.title: Roma, Pure - Roller Blind
products.description: The snowy white of the roma pure is fresh and cool, allowing plenty of light in from outside, yet offering privacy and neutrality. The fabric is lightweight and durable, making it the ideal option for a blind that could get a lot of use. Light, airy living rooms make beautiful entertainment spaces, and this blind will only help to set that off. The soft hue won't clash in an all-white environment, and also creates an excellent colour break when teamed with bright colours such as emerald greens, poppy reds, and sky blues.

products.title: Roma, Natural - Roller Blind
products.description: This roma is natural by name, and natural by nature. This creamy off-white shade will allow plenty of light to penetrate through into the room, while still offering plenty of privacy when needed, meaning that you could have this blind closed all the time if need be. An excellent choice for rooms needing both privacy and light, such as a bathroom or bedroom, this shade will match pretty much any colour scheme.
